title: # 537 - Mark Normand, Dave Williamson & ME
itunes:title: # 537 - Mark Normand, Dave Williamson & ME
description:
Today, I sit down in Colorado with comedians, Mark Normand and Dave Williamson. We talk about performing at Red Rocks, ex girlfriends, first loves, cheating, Shane Gillis, Marks accent, and much more! 

 

Follow Mark

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/marknormand 

Twitter: https://twitter.com/marknorm  

 

Follow Dave

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/davewcomedy 

Twitter: https://mobile.twitter.com/davewcomedy 

 

This episode is also brought to you by Helix. Get up to $200 off all mattress orders and 2 free pillows at http://www.helixsleep.com/bert

 

This episode is brought to you by Ladder. Go to http://www.ladderlife.com/bert to find out if you’re approved today!

 

This episode is also brought to you by Mad Rabbit Tattoo. Go to http://www.madrabbit.com/bertcast and use the promo code “BERTCAST” for 25% off.
